column4: is it possible to make gnome start upon login rather than on boot?   IE; i will see a simple terminal prompt for login rather than the gui login screen, upon login gnome will start and present the desktop?
you'll need to set your default run-level to 3
that will allow you to login in at the command prompt and you can execute it from there
so x starts at run level 4?     anything else that will be disabled?
